name: Brick
description:
Brick!

This is a game of ability where  you need to place bricks to move the ball in the right direction to score! Every time the ball breaks a brick from the scenario you will get another change to create another brick. But beware! if the ball gets out you'll lose!

Controls

- Single click: place a brick.

- Click and move: place a brick an move it


Music by SketchyLogic
